column1: Smoque BBQ////Was going to be in the area Sunday evening and so I finally stopped by for the first time. It was 8pm
column2: we found parking right in front (the street across is residential only though)
column3: the place was busy but boo and I were next in line
column4: so very little wait...great start. They were closing in an hour at 9
column5: so the fact that the place was still so lively was very impressive. Other reviews make it out to seem that the place is tiny with virtually no seating
column6: but they actually do have a decent amount
column7: especially with the outdoor tables. However
column8: since this place is always at capacity
